welcome.intro: I'm your L9ani assistant. I can help you:
welcome.prompt: How can I help you today?

responses.greeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
responses.createReport: I'll help you create a report. What type would you like?
responses.searchReports: What are you looking for? Describe it naturally.
responses.checkStatus: Let me check your report status...
responses.platformHelp: I can help you with the platform. What do you need?
responses.emergency: If this is an emergency, please contact authorities immediately!
responses.unknown: I'm not sure I understood. Could you rephrase that?
responses.error: Sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Please try again.
responses.cancel: No problem! I've cancelled the current operation. What would you like to do instead?
responses.thanks: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
responses.goodbye: Goodbye! Take care and good luck!
responses.foundItem: That's great that you found something! You can report the found item or search to see if someone is looking for it.

reportCreation.askOptional: Would you like to add more details?
reportCreation.complete: Perfect! I'll take you to the form now.

search.found: I found {count} report(s) matching your search:
search.noResults: I couldn't find any matching reports.

status.noReports: You don't have any reports yet.

emergency.title: Emergency Contacts
emergency.warning: If this is an emergency, contact authorities immediately!
